channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins GitLab Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins GitLab Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30955|2024-08-03T07:03:39.911Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitLab Plugin 1.5.31 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-34777|2024-08-03T09:22:10.421Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitLab Plugin 1.5.34 and earlier does not escape multiple fields inserted into the description of webhook-triggered builds, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
